categories.name: Agriculture
categories.description: Testing services for soil, plant, water, compost/mulch and fertilizer. We provide services to farms, golf courses, and nurseries in Arizona and surrounding regions.

categories.name: Construction / Materials
categories.description: With our engineering background, we perform soil aggregate testing using the ADOT, CDOT, AASHTO and ASTM specified methods.

categories.name: Environmental Analysis
categories.description: Detailed analysis of environmental samples including water, soil, and air quality testing.

categories.name: Microbiology
categories.description: Identification and analysis of microorganisms in various samples.

categories.name: Soil Analysis
categories.description: Comprehensive soil testing services for agricultural and environmental applications.

categories.name: Plant/Tissue Analysis
categories.description: Plant/Tissue, Petiole Analysis for crop health and nutritional assessment.

categories.name: Water Analysis
categories.description: Water quality testing for irrigation and agricultural use.

categories.name: Compost Analysis
categories.description: Testing services for compost and organic soil amendments.

categories.name: Fertilizer Analysis
categories.description: Analysis of fertilizer composition and quality.

tests.name: Complete Soil Analysis
tests.description: Comprehensive soil analysis including pH, Electrical Conductivity (EC), Calcium (Ca), Magnesium (Mg), Sodium (Na), Potassium(K), Zinc (Zn), Iron (Fe), Manganese (Mn), Copper (Cu), Nickel (Ni), Nitrate-N (NO3-N), Phosphate-P (PO4-P), Sulfate-S (SO4-S), Boron (B), Free Lime, ESP (Calc), CEC (Calc)

tests.name: Organic Matter - LOI
tests.description: Organic Matter content analysis using Loss on Ignition method

tests.name: Soil pH and EC
tests.description: Basic soil pH and Electrical Conductivity test

tests.name: Soil Aggregate Testing
tests.description: Soil aggregate testing using ADOT, CDOT, AASHTO and ASTM specified methods

tests.name: Construction Materials Analysis
tests.description: Testing of construction materials for quality control and compliance

tests.name: Water Quality Analysis
tests.description: Comprehensive water quality testing for environmental monitoring

tests.name: Soil Contamination Assessment
tests.description: Testing for environmental contaminants in soil samples

tests.name: Pathogen Detection
tests.description: Detection of pathogenic microorganisms in samples
